alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 15 at 6:11AM AKDT until October 15 at 11:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A mix of freezing rain and snow is occuring. Ice accumulations of under one tenth of an inch. Snow amounts up to one inch. * WHERE...Fairbanks North Star Borough southeast to Denali Park. * WHEN...Until 11 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Driving and walking surfaces will be very slippery. Ice that formed overnight is now being covered by snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain developed late Saturday night from Fairbanks to Denali Park and caused a glaze of ice in many areas. Freezing rain mixed with snow early this morning, and is expected to taper off later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
